lead_paragraph: President Obama has once again complained to lawmakers about the slow pace of judicial confirmations, calling the blocking of his nominations "a dramatic shift from past practice that could cause a crisis in the judiciary."
snippet: In a new letter to senators, President Obama complains about the slow pace of judicial confirmations.

headline.main: Obama Blasts G.O.P. for Stalling Judicial Nominations

abstract: In a new letter to senators, President Obama complains about the slow pace of judicial confirmations.
